edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.commitmentScheme

Interface CmtCommitmentPhaseValues

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CmtElGamalCommitmentPhaseValues, CmtPedersenCommitmentPhaseValues, CmtSimpleHashCommitmentValues

    public interface CmtCommitmentPhaseValues
    General interface of the committer's commit phase values.

    Classes implementing this interface will hold the value to commit, the computed commitment and the random values used for the computation.

    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Yael Ejgenberg)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Object getComputedCommitment()
      The commitment objects can be vary in the different commitment scheme.
      RandomValue getR()
      Returns the random value used for commit the value.
      CmtCommitValue getX()
      Returns the committed value.
